content:
Mrs. Murdo: While I understand your desire to be in a higher grade level, Alicia, student placement is determined based on age and academic level, as well as other factors such as social and emotional development. The school has a system in place to ensure that all students receive an education that is appropriate for their individual needs and abilities.

However, I encourage you to continue challenging yourself in your learning and to communicate with me if you feel that you need more advanced material or challenges. Let's work together to help you reach your full potential in 1st grade.
